items.text: short of length outside off, cuts it towards deep extra cover
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: down the track and looks go towards long-off, gets an outside edge towards deep cover
items.shortText: Bishoo to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: fuller on the stumps, driven towards long-off
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: Mmp: "We hardly see such raw pace bowling in Bangladeshi pitches. Every bowler loses pace while bowling here. Thomas is something different. Hope he can be consistent with line as well. although I am from Bangladesh I think getting tested by his pace is something beautiful to watch. "
items.text: down the track and lofted inside out over extra cover, the sweeper cover comes across and keeps it to two
items.shortText: Bishoo to Liton Das, 2 runs

items.text: swept towards the left of deep square leg this time, only a single though
items.postText: MonirBD: "@TQ, There are no leg spinner taken by any team in upcoming BPL19. So how they will be on the lookout for a mystery spinner/leg spinner ?? Is it a joke? "
items.shortText: Bishoo to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: short of length, pulled away towards deep square leg
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, driven on the up towards sweeper cover
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: down the leg side and given a wide
items.postText: Here is Isam's response: "TQ: Sunil Joshi is on a day-to-day basis contract with the BCB. His only job is with the Bangladesh team. In the last 15 months, he hasn't once worked with anyone else apart from those in the national camp. I doubt if he will be around during BPL to look for any mystery spinner."
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, 1 wide

items.text: fuller on middle and leg, pushed short midwicket
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, no run

items.text: back of length outside off, dabs it towards third man
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: Mushfiqur also steers this length ball towards third man and rotates the strikes
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: length, in the corridor, hangs his bat out and gets a genuine outside edge, would have been a dolly for first slip but for now, it's a boundary to third man
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: tossed up on the stumps, comes forward and defends
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: tossed up outside off, pushes at it and gets beaten with the spin and bounce, whips off the bails, an appeal for caught-behind as well but given not out, they are waiting for stumping though. The umpires are going upstairs for the stumping though, Mushfiqur dragged his foot out but was quick to bring it back
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: goes for the reverse sweep, and goes up and over short third man, gets a boundary
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball, on the stumps, defended from the back foot
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: Mahneel: "@MonirBD, BPL is a franchise tournament. Team owners will only take proven players and that's justified, they wouldn't normally want their teams to be testing ground for hidden talents. It should be BCB who should come up with methods to unravel a perfect leggie for the team!"
items.text: slower in the air, length ball just around off, defended
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: flatter this time, stays back and blocks
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length, down the leg side, misses the glance but will get a leg-bye to fine leg
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, 2 leg byes

items.text: length, pitching outside off and coming back in after landing, Liton goes across, looking to hit it towards midwicket, misses and the off stump is out of the ground
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, OUT

items.preText: Shakib Al Hasan now. Paul goes around the wicket, a slip in place
items.text: length, just around off, defended back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: a touch fuller on middle and off, driven back once more
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: Syed Kabir: "What a terrible shot by Das after another good start. He keeps throwing it away needlessly time and time again after looking good. "
items.text: an attempted bouncer, Shakib swivels and pulls it behind square leg boundary for four, gets off the mark
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: length around off, driven on the up, back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: slower, flighted around off, turned away towards square leg
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run
